Attribute.Name: EndDate
Attribute.Description: End Date of the date range.

Description.div: The node associated with the resource pool.

Attribute.Name: StartDate
Attribute.Description: Start Date of the date range.

Description.div: A Resource Pool is always created wihin the context of a Capacity Organization. An Organization can source services from any Resource Pools within the same Capacity Organization.
The node associated with the resource pool.
This element shows the capacity picture on a particular date and for a particular unit of measure.

Attribute.Name: AllocatedConsumption
Attribute.Description: Allocated Consumption of the resource pool for the date. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, this is the sum of allocated consumptions of the resources.

Attribute.Name: Availability
Attribute.Description: Availability of the resource pool for the date. If the ConsiderSupplementalCapacity flag is passed as Y in the input, supplemental capacity is considered in the Availability. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, this is the sum of the availabilities of the resources.

Attribute.Name: Capacity
Attribute.Description: Capacity of the resource pool for the date. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, this is the sum of capacities of the resources.

Attribute.Name: CapacityUnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: The capacity unit of measure in which the capacities are defined.

Description.div: Sum of capacity from each service resource associated with the resource pool in the slot for the date.

Attribute.Name: IsCapacityOverridden
Attribute.Description: Indicate if the Capacity is the overridden capacity for the date.

Attribute.Name: IsWorkingDay
Attribute.Description: Indicate if the date is a working day. For the resource pool which defines resources, IsWorkingDay will be set to Y , if at least one of the resource is working on this day.

Attribute.Name: OverrideReason
Attribute.Description: The reason this capacity was overridden.

Attribute.Name: StandardCapacity
Attribute.Description: Standard Capacity of the resource pool for the date. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, StandardCapacity will be 0.

Attribute.Name: StandardSupplementalCapacity
Attribute.Description: The standard supplemental capacity of the resource pool for the date. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, StandardSupplementalCapacity will be 0.

Attribute.Name: SupplementalCapacity
Attribute.Description: The supplemental capacity of the resource pool for the date. For the resource pool which maintains capacity at resource level, SupplementalCapacity will be 0.
